title: Actress Michelle Williams Rallies Support For Equal Pay Day in DC
content:
This is yet another example of the 'Big Lie' strategy of the left-wing scum.
Actors are paid (by CONTRACT) according to their 'Q ratings'; which are, basically, popularity polls.
Outside of Hollywood, the leftists implement the 'Big Lie' by just lumping ALL women's salaries together and doing the same for men and comparing the averages.
The TRUTH is that, if you compare similar jobs in similar locations, women make a little bit MORE than do men.
The differences REALLY lie in the CHOICES that are made!
More women become nurses. More men become doctors. More women go into occupations like social work and retail sales. More men go into business.
The one thing that ALWAYS remains the same is that left-wingers ALWAYS LIE!
